author: Bob Herman
title: Taking care of coronavirus patients after they leave the hospital
description: Hospitals have been clearing beds to care for the influx of coronavirus patients, but there's a looming capacity and equipment problem for the vast majority of patients who recover and need to be discharged to another facility. Reality check: "I don't know th…
content:
